interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HMPRT 80s Costumes for Men, Halloween Heavy Metal Rocker Wig with Trucker Hat, Black T-Shirt Outfit, 90s Accessories Blow Up Guitar Music Costume Prop,L
Review Date: 2022/06/09
Store: HMPRT
Product Description: ['5Pcs Halloween 80s costume include:one 80s hatone 80s mullet wigone 80s black shirtone 80s guitarone wig cap. What you see is what you get.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.79 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'HM-WayneSet-L', 'Department': 'Men', 'Manufacturer': 'HMPRT'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:3374f8248a4d50ea0b36f2f53972ccc1]] the guitar is a small, plastic blow up, but the wig, shirt and hat are good quality. the wig hair is a bit wild and will need some brushing or even a cut to really make it look like wayne’s (i think it’s longer than wayne’s hair). it’s a good value for an easy halloween costume. could also be used to dress up as a rock and roll guitarist just by switching out the hat.
Review Title: party on! excelente!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

nice color, nice texture, soft. comes with 2 nylon hair caps. great value for price.

SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz
MELARQT
{'Brand': 'MELARQT', 'Item Form': 'Scrub', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.09 x 2.01 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '810042384002'}
my fifteen year old has been using this (along with the daily facial cleanser) and it has helped clear the acne on his forehead. he gives it 5 stars!
helps with teenage boy acne
Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'}
nice spray bottles.... just remember...it's glass, so be careful!
nice bottles!
Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
nice set of spray bottles!! I used it to mix/dilute bleach and other chemical products that needed to be in new, unrecycled bottles. sprayer works fine, although one of them did leak when i turned the bottle upside down. not sure if that would happen with all the bottles, or just this one sprayer that i received. if you have other "plastic" spray bottles around your house, it will be easy to forget that this one is GLASS, so just be careful.
nice set of glass bottles!!
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
[[VIDEOID:b3f95d0500123286d6c86e59790a77bd]] i appreciate a product that has a safety foil, so thumbs up for that! nice, clean scent, that reminds me of cucumbers. a thick, almost gel like consistency; doesn't lather very much, but still leaves face feeling fresh, clean, soft and smooth!
nice scent, gentle cleanser
Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz
Bouquet Garni
{'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
[[VIDEOID:5a1f001511c47e51512c7544aeef60f4]] if you like a musky scent, then this soap is for you. it lathers well (see video) and has a somewhat strong musk scent; not overly strong, but definitely not light. did not dry out my skin. packaged well in a box; pump has a safety guard that doesn't allow the pump to be pressed until it's removed.
lathers well
Spray Bottle with Adjustable Nozzle, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Green Mist Sprayer with Stream for Curly Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Bottle for Hairdressing, Planting, Ironing and Cleaning
SUREAM
{'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.49 x 3.07 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '735632989217'}
made of durable, strong plastic; not flimsy or squeezable like cheaper plastic bottles..nice size and shape. twist open/close spray nozzle. good height, so won’t topple over, even when empty.
durable plastic, nice color.
Pet Tear Stain Remover Comb, 8 Pcs Double-Sided Dog Eye Comb Brush, Double Head Grooming Comb, Multipurpose Tool for Small Pet Cat Dogs Crust and Mucus Removal (Silver & Black)
LBSXQGS
{'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Brand': 'LBSXQGS', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Size': 'Small', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 6.89 x 0.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '805110051801'}
I tried to use these on my 6lb maltipoo, but she squirmed too much and I was so afraid of poking her eyes with it.  I used the brush side on her, but it didn't help as much as the puppy comb I use on her regularly. however... these work great for ME!! love it to brush my eyebrows and separate any makeup clumps in my lashes!  not sure what the purpose is of selling these in a pack of 8, except to share and have spare ones everywhere.
more safe and useful on human than dog
BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|10ML
BEPHOLAN
{'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 1.18 x 1.06 inches; 0.88 Ounces'}
[[VIDEOID:ab1f3554604ea2e327f24928218d64e1]] I used this for over a month before posting this review. my lashes had no improvement after using this serum. I liked that there was a lot of serum in the small bottle (other serums I've tried always seems like there's not much serum in the bottle), however, a lot of serum gets wasted on the wand because the bottle hole doesn't help to keep any excess inside (see my video for better explanation). still, the bottom line is that this didn't work for me.
no improvement for me
NVTED 2 PCS Pet Bath Brush, 2 in 1 Dog Cat Double-Sided Massage Grooming Sponge Bath Shampoo Brushes Soft Silicone Bristles Give Pet Gentle Massage
NVTED
{'Brand': 'NVTED', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Bristle Material': 'Silicone', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.58 x 6.97 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796999392'}
we use both brushes to bathe two different breeds, one on a maltese/shitzu and the other on a short haired terrier mix. they both work great and help with the scrubbing. much more effective than just using your hands. the silicone is soft and not rough on their skin. seems very durable and i expect it will last a long time. easy to hold.
great brushes for dog bath
COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (05 Gray Brown)
COLORGRAM
{'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening'}
i have very dark brows, but black colored pencils just looks too harsh on me. this gray brown color is a perfect match, to fill in the sparse areas of my brows.  the pencil shape is not a pointy tip, so it’s not really for precision penciling, but more for “filling in”.  i prefer a natural look, so this works great for my needs.  it’s a twist pencil (no sharpening), and you get about 1” of pencil in the tube.
perfect color match; natural looking
ROSEGEMM Birthday Gifts For Women- Your Best Friend, Sister, Mom, Wife, Or Any Female! Give A Gift That Shows You Care! Unique Package For Self Care, Relaxing For Her Special Bday! Cute For Any Woman!
ROSEGEMM
{'Brand': 'ROSEGEMM', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 7.68 x 4.06 inches; 2.25 Pounds', 'Department': 'womens', 'UPC': '628678717022'}
[[VIDEOID:d9b745d7c2810ac319e3bd7f10de25e6]] it's a cute boxed set with various items ranging from bath bombs, to a necklace, to a wine tumbler. if you don't have time or thought to get a special gift, then this a decent backup. Not sure if all the items are worth $49, but again, if you need it quick and don't want to put much thought into a personal gift, then this is for you. the rose gold necklace is pretty, and I like that the tumbler is blank with no branding or decorations on it. the bath bombs are mediocre and the candle and body scrub have a light vanilla scent to them. the gift box itself is nice and well packaged. definitely giftable.
nice gift set with various items
